original_title: Tales of the Bizarre: 2004 Spring Special
overview: Hosted by veteran comedian Tamori, "Bizarre Tales 2004 Spring Special" presents five tales.  1. Koroshiya desu no yo (It's a Hitman, You Know) - starring Mizuki Alisa.  2. Jibun-counsellor (Self-counsellor) - starring Inohara Yoshihiko.  3. Be Silent - starring Watabe Atsuro.  4. Sasoimizu (Pump-priming) - starring Harada Taizo.  5. Saigo no Hitotoki (The Last Moment) - starring Nagasaku Hiromi.
title: Tales of the Bizarre: 2004 Spring Special
